divs: Sighting DetailsI was out in a nearby field to my home walking my dog when I saw three strange orange lights hovering in the sky. They then dissapeared without flying away but rather just into thin air. I thought mabye an airplane or helicopter but the object didnt move but rather stayed stationary? An exciting experience and I will be out every night until I see this object again.
trends: There have been 122 other sightings in Pittsburgh
There were no other sightings in Pittsburgh on or around December 18th 2008
Summary: Saw strange orange lights in the sky that hovered.
